sourcesContent:
export { Entity } from './entity';
export { Message } from './message';

export { RedisClient } from './client';
export { RedisStream } from './stream';

export const VALIDATION_RULES = {
  ORGANIZATION_NAME_MAX_LENGTH: 30,
  SCHOOL_NAME_MAX_LENGTH: 120,
  PROGRAM_NAME_MAX_LENGTH: 30,
  ROLE_NAME_MAX_LENGTH: 20,
  SHORTCODE_MAX_LENGTH: 16,

  ORGANIZATION_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: 3,
  SCHOOL_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: 3,
  PROGRAM_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: 3,

  CLASS_NAME_MAX_LENGTH: 45,
  CLASS_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: 3,
  CLASS_SHORT_CODE_MAX_LENGTH: 16,

  CLIENT_MAX_LENGTH: 255,
  STATUS_MAX_LENGTH: 255,

  USER_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: 2,
  USER_NAME_MAX_LENGTH: 35,

  EMAIL_MAX_LENGTH: 250,

  PHONE_REGEX: /^\+[1-9]\d{1,14}$/,

  DOB_REGEX: /^(((0)[0-9])|((1)[0-2]))(-)\d{4}$/,

  GENDER_MIN_LENGTH: 3,
  GENDER_MAX_LENGTH: 16,

  ALPHANUMERIC: /^[\p{L}\d .'&/,-]*$/u,
};

import Joi from 'joi';

import { VALIDATION_RULES } from './validationRules';

export const userSchema = Joi.object({
  externalUuid: Joi.string().guid({ version: ['uuidv4'] }),

  externalOrganizationUuid: Joi.string()
    .guid({ version: ['uuidv4'] })
    .required(),

  externalSchoolUuid: Joi.string()
    .guid({ version: ['uuidv4'] })
    .required(),

  givenName: Joi.string()
    .min(VALIDATION_RULES.USER_NAME_MIN_LENGTH)
    .max(VALIDATION_RULES.USER_NAME_MAX_LENGTH)
    .regex(VALIDATION_RULES.ALPHANUMERIC)
    .required(),

  familyName: Joi.string()
    .min(VALIDATION_RULES.USER_NAME_MIN_LENGTH)
    .max(VALIDATION_RULES.USER_NAME_MAX_LENGTH)
    .regex(VALIDATION_RULES.ALPHANUMERIC)
    .required(),

  username: Joi.string().required(),

  email: Joi.string().email().max(VALIDATION_RULES.EMAIL_MAX_LENGTH),

  phone: Joi.string().regex(VALIDATION_RULES.PHONE_REGEX),

  dateOfBirth: Joi.string().regex(VALIDATION_RULES.DOB_REGEX),

  gender: Joi.string()
    .regex(VALIDATION_RULES.ALPHANUMERIC)
    .min(VALIDATION_RULES.GENDER_MIN_LENGTH)
    .max(VALIDATION_RULES.GENDER_MAX_LENGTH)
    .required(),
}).or('email', 'phone');
export { AdminService } from './adminService';
